#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int t,len,i;
	string str;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>str;
		char ch[55];
		strcpy(ch,str.c_str());
		len=strlen(ch);
		for(i=len/2-1;i>=0;i--)
		 cout<<ch[i];
		for(i=len-1;i>=len/2;i--)
			cout<<ch[i];
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
